What are you looking for Advanced Search Home > All Categories > Dining Out > Fast Food > Resolved Question Misplaced Apostrophe's Member since: 04 March 2009 Total points: 12,823 (Level 6) Add Contact Block
Resolved Question Show me another » It took me 20 minutes to receive my order at McDonald's. Remind me again, why is it called"Fast Food"?
4 months ago Report Abuse by ? Member since: 11 March 2012 Total points: 1,651 (Level 3) Add Contact Block
Best Answer - Chosen by Voters hey you're an alien, you guys eat mcdonalds too huh 4 months ago Report Abuse 19% 7 Votes Action Bar: 0 stars - mark this as Interesting! Email Comment ( 0 ) Save RSS
There are currently no comments for this question.
* You must be logged into Answers to add comments. Sign in or Register .
This question about" It took me 20 minute… "was originally asked in Yahoo! Answers Australia
Other Answers (8) Show: All Answers Oldest to Newest Newest to Oldest Rated Highest to Lowest by Will Member since: 21 May 2010 Total points: 977 (Level 2) Add Contact Block Most likely because you were a difficult customer who didn't know what they wanted so they had to re-make your order multiple times. We are not ALL idiots at McDonald's, the majority of us are students in high school or college, trying to pay for our education. Source(s): I work at McD's. 4 months ago Report Abuse 11% 4 Votes by Catman Member since: 17 December 2010 Total points: 3,736 (Level 4) Add Contact Block Fastest time on a meal at Chick-Fil-A for a regular combo was about 5 seconds.
Don't believe me? They have chutes for regular sandwiches so they can just take them and give them to you. 4 months ago Report Abuse 3% 1 Vote by Spike Member since: 18 March 2012 Total points: 1,256 (Level 3) Add Contact Block Because the meat is actually just processed pink slime. 4 months ago Report Abuse 16% 6 Votes 1 person rated this as good by Sean Member since: 17 March 2012 Total points: 127 (Level 1) Add Contact Block It's probably opposite day ^.^ 4 months ago Report Abuse 8% 3 Votes by peggy b Member since: 21 February 2008 Total points: 5,872 (Level 5) Add Contact Block Morons work at McDonalds 4 months ago Report Abuse 14% 5 Votes by royce Member since: 17 March 2012 Total points: 342 (Level 2) Add Contact Block because its fast to eat the food, but service can vary. 4 months ago Report Abuse 16% 6 Votes by Fyfe Member since: 24 March 2012 Total points: 81 (Level 1) Add Contact Block Because the workers are crap 4 months ago Report Abuse 5% 2 Votes 1 person rated this as good by David Member since: 05 November 2011 Total points: 541 (Level 2) Add Contact Block I would have told them give me my money back and left 4 months ago Report Abuse 5% 2 Votes
